response.overview: A young lad named Tip embarks on an adventure that leads them to a country schoolhouse, where they encounter Professor Knowitt and the mischievous Woggle-Bug. Meanwhile, General Jinjur's Army of Revolt, composed of  peasant women, rises against the male-dominated City of Jewels. Along the way, Tip uncovers secrets about his true identity and the enchanting world they navigate, filled with magical transformations, surprising allies, and whimsical encounters.
response.title: The Woggle Bug - The Movie
